mapper.insert: insert into orders (number, status, user_id, address_book_id, order_time, checkout_time, pay_status, amount, remark, phone, address, user_name, consignee, pay_method, delivery_status, pack_amount, tableware_number, tableware_status) values (#{number}, #{status}, #{userId}, #{addressBookId}, #{orderTime}, #{checkoutTime}, #{payStatus}, #{amount}, #{remark}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{userName}, #{consignee}, #{payMethod}, #{deliveryStatus}, #{packAmount}, #{tablewareNumber}, #{tablewareStatus})
